actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend section 812 of the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973 to provide for the expedited reporting of large sales of agricultural commodities for export.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1970 to require daily release by the Secretary of Agriculture of reports of large export sales of agricultural commodities.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 812 of the Agriculture and Consumer Protection Act of 1973 to provide for the expedited reporting of large sales of agricultural commodities for export.
